rules.natural: If the device is made of fire-retardant material, then whenever the device is not powered on in normal mode, it follows that the device is safe at high temperature.
Provided that the device is made of non-conductive material, if the device is not powered on in normal mode, then the device is safe at high temperature.
Under the condition that the device is manufactured by a certified company, the device is made of fire-retardant material.
Whenever the device is manufactured by an approved supplier, the device is made of non-conductive material.
If the device is tested at the safety lab, then it is the case that the device is manufactured by a certified company or by an approved supplier.
In case the device is tested at the quality center, the device is manufactured by a certified company or by an approved supplier.
If the device is banned from sale, then the device is recalled from the market.
Under the condition that the device is malfunctioning in the sensor system, the device is reporting accurate data.
Either the device is malfunctioning in the sensor system or the device is powered on in normal mode.

If the device is compliant with electronic standards, then either the device is updated to the firmware version or, provided that the device is malfunctioning in the sensor system, the device is not reporting accurate data.
In case the device is reviewed by the committee, if the device is not compliant with electronic standards, then the device is exempt from testing requirements.
If the device is overheating during normal operation, then the device is stable within the temperature range.
Either the device is overheating during normal operation or, if the device is approved in the final inspection, then the device is powered on in normal mode.
Provided that the device is approved by the legislation council, the device meets the furniture integration requirement.
Either the device is approved by the legislation council or the device is certified for the safety standard.
In case the device is inspected by the safety officer, if the device is overheating during normal operation, then the device is not stable within the temperature range.
Either the device is inspected by the safety officer or the device is inspected by the compliance team.
Under the condition that the device is inspected by the compliance team, whenever the device is overheating during normal operation, the device is not stable within the temperature range.
If the device is submitted for certification, then the device is documented in the compliance report.

Whenever the device is certified for the safety standard, provided that it is not the case that if the device is not powered on in normal mode then it is compliant with material safety, it follows that the device is not compliant with condition monitoring.

In case the device meets the furniture integration requirement, if it is not true that whenever the device is not powered on in normal mode it is compliant with material safety, then the device is not compliant with condition monitoring.
Either the device is installed in the living room or the device is not operational in power saving mode.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(compliant(device, furniture_regulation) -> (tested(device, safety_lab) | tested(device, quality_center))) -> banned(device, sale))
rules.natural: Under the condition that it is not true that whenever the device is compliant with furniture regulation the device is tested at the safety lab or at the quality center, the device is banned from sale.

If it is not true that the device is updated to the firmware version or, provided that the device is malfunctioning in the sensor system, the device is not reporting accurate data, then the device is submitted for certification.

Whenever it is not the case that either the device is updated to the firmware version or, if the device is malfunctioning in the sensor system, then the device is not reporting accurate data, it is not the case that the device is documented in the compliance report.

rules.prover9_expression: (-(registered(device, compliance_database) -> (installed(device, living_room) -> connected(device, smart_hub))) -> flagged(device, inspection))
rules.natural: Provided that it is not the case that if the device is registered in the compliance database then, whenever the device is installed in the living room, the device is connected to the smart hub, the device is flagged for inspection.

In case it is not true that if the device is registered in the compliance database then, under the condition that the device is installed in the living room, the device is connected to the smart hub, the device is not flagged for inspection.
If it is not the case that if the device is not powered on in normal mode then the device is compliant with material safety, then the device is compliant with condition monitoring.
In case the device is not powered on in normal mode, the device is operational in power saving mode.
